name: Home Assistant Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Home Assistant Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Home Assistant API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Home Assistant API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: config

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create

cameraEntityId.name: cameraEntityId
cameraEntityId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
cameraEntityId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Camera Entity Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Put Output File in Field | 提示: The name of the output binary field to put the file in | 默认值: data | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

eventType.name: eventType
eventType.description: The Entity ID for which an event will be created
eventType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Event Type | 作用: The Entity ID for which an event will be created | (必填项)

eventAttributes.name: eventAttributes
eventAttributes.natural_language_description: 参数名: Event Attributes | 默认值: {}

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: endTime (值: None) - The end of the period
startTime (值: None) - The beginning of the period

domain.name: domain
domain.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
domain.natural_language_description: 参数名: Domain Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

service.name: service
service.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
service.natural_language_description: 参数名: Service Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

serviceAttributes.name: serviceAttributes
serviceAttributes.natural_language_description: 参数名: Service Attributes | 默认值: {}

entityId.name: entityId
entityId.description: The entity ID for which a state will be created. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
entityId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Entity Name or ID | 作用: The entity ID for which a state will be created. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

stateAttributes.name: stateAttributes
stateAttributes.natural_language_description: 参数名: State Attributes | 默认值: {}

template.name: template
template.description: Render a Home Assistant template. See template docs for more information..
template.natural_language_description: 参数名: Template | 作用: Render a Home Assistant template. See template docs for more information.. | (必填项)
